Pressure sensitive in the sense that you can shoot it with a high powered rifle without it going off, or burn it in a fire without exploding. Mythbusters did a great episode on that. It is made to be stable until you want to have it go off. That is one of the things that makes old gunpowder so dangerous - it blew the guy carrying it into battle apart a couple of times too often. People got fed up with that and guys stupid enough to still do it were running out, so they made better explosives.

Hey, unless I'm mistaken, this mod doesn't reaaaally work in DMP right? You can't pair up with a buddy, build something, and then challenge each other to a duel at the KSC? I understand you sorta can, but when you blow them up (or vice versa), they won't know it happened?

Hey, unless I'm mistaken, this mod doesn't reaaaally work in DMP right? You can't pair up with a buddy, build something, and then challenge each other to a duel at the KSC? I understand you sorta can, but when you blow them up (or vice versa), they won't know it happened?

Yes, the guns work fine for the client, but the server does not tell your friend you killed him, nor sync bullets etc.

There are plans to make it work on the future, but right now it doesn't.

But this is not actually a bad thing, because this way you can kill your friend several times and he will respawn without having to launch again etc.

Missiles also sync, but as DMP damping code counts for speed and not acceleration they jump around quite a bit, which is what makes it harder to see when your enemy fires.

You can still have a lot of fun using this mod and multiplayer, and actual dogfights with friends
